entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 17.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
